li.label: Became elk morph
li.description: Great, now I look like a big, shaggy lump.

li.label: Became elk morph
li.description: I feel so majestic, so imposing. This is awesome!

li.label: Became elk morph
li.description: An elk? Isn't that just a big deer? Oh I don't care! Just make it stop!

li.label: Became elk morph
li.description: A good start, how far can I go?

li.label: Reverted
li.description: It's me, I'm back!

li.label: Reverted
li.description: No! My magesty!

li.label: Reverted
li.description: Oh the humanity! MY humanity! Yay!

li.label: Reverted
li.description: But I was so close to perfection...

li.label: Elk face
li.description: I can barely talk with this thing...

li.label: Elk face
li.description: ...This is kinda cool, I guess?

li.label: Elk face
li.description: What happened to my face?!?

li.label: Elk ears
li.description: Will they ever stop itching?

li.label: Elk ears
li.description: I can hear so well now!

li.label: Elk ears
li.description: These things are so twitchy, get them off me!

li.label: Elk tail
li.description: Is this stubby little thing...a tail?

li.label: Elk tail
li.description: It's so small and fluffy!

li.label: Elk tail
li.description: At least I can hide it.

li.label: Antlers
li.description: How am I supposed to rest on my pillow?

li.label: Antlers
li.description: Behold! Are they not impressive?

li.label: Antlers
li.description: These things are horrible. I'm so top heavy now I can hardly walk in a straight line.

li.label: Antlers
li.description: With these, I'd be right at home in the forest.
